text: Bessenbach is a community in the Aschaffenburg district in the Regierungsbezirk of Lower Franconia (Unterfranken) in Bavaria, Germany. ==Geography== ===Location=== Bessenbach lies southeast of the town of Aschaffenburg among the Spessart range's outlying hills. ===Subdivision=== Bessenbach's Ortsteile are Beetacker, Frauengrund, Gemeindezentrum, Keilberg, Klingerhof, Klingermühle, Oberbessenbach, Steiger, Straßbessenbach, Unterbessenbach, Waldmichelbach and Weiler. ==Governance== ===Community council=== The council is made up of 20 council members. CSU SPD Total 2008 14 6 20 seats (as at municipal election held on 2 March 2008) ===Town twinning=== * Dury, Somme, France * Saint-Fuscien, Somme, France * Sains-en-Amiénois, Somme, France This is one partnership that Bessenbach has maintained with all three French communes since 1985. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Aschaffenburg (district)
title: Bessenbach
